text:
Hi, mi Apache server report this error.
[Fri Aug 09 12:24:36 2002] [debug] .\server\mpm\winnt\mpm_winnt.c(562): Parent: 
Marked listeners as not inheritable.
I try more requests to me one PHP script, sending is OK, but if PHP script 
write results, Apache is going down and restart with error.
Thanks.
Sorry of my english.
creator: roman_salis@yourwap.com

text:
'[Fri Aug 09 12:24:36 2002] [debug] .\server\mpm\winnt\mpm_winnt.c(562): Parent: 
   Marked listeners as not inheritable.'

That's not an error, it's a status message.

Since it is PHP that is segfaulting, I suggest you upgrade to the latest
and greatest release.  You may even need to wait for a new version that is
in sync with Apache 2.0.40.

In any case, this report belongs with the appropriate PHP user support lists,
I'm certain they can point you at the right version to use with windows.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
